trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Representerer tekstbaserte innholdet i grammatikk elementer som er definert av World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: The SrgsText class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SrgsText representerer teksten funnet i et sett med SRGS objektkoder.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a SrgsText object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objektet er konstruert med en <xref:System.String>parameteren SrgsText-objektet er opprettet med den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>egenskapen initialisert med verdien for parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>objektet legges til i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>samlingen på den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> klasse, angir teksten for forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som brukes til å angi den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*>egenskap i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten i den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> klasseforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
An attempt is made to set Text to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å angi tekst <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
